attributes.action: To ensure Bus Companys include fare price on the ticket for Consessionary Bus Pass Holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bus Companys such as Stagecoach when issueing tickets to those with a bus pass, a ticket marked free, this should be changed to show actual fare, although journey is free.
This therefore would make it easier for the respective bus company to claim from the fund for consessionary travel from the county council, or public transport authority involved.
